snippet: Vietnam’s political mandarins are struggling to reconcile their party’s message of social justice and equality with the realities of an elite awash in wealth and privilege.
abstract: Vietnam’s political mandarins are struggling to reconcile the Communist Party’s message of social justice and equality with the realities of an elite awash in wealth and privilege; the yawning divide between rural poverty and urban wealth in the country has become especially jarring as a decade of breakneck growth has come to an end, dimming the prospects for the poor and middle class to fight their way up the social ladder.
lead_paragraph: Vietnam’s political mandarins are struggling to reconcile their party’s message of social justice and equality with the realities of an elite awash in wealth and privilege.

headline.seo: Leaders’ Message of Equality Is Challenged by Vietnam’s Growing Gap
headline.main: In Vietnam, Message of Equality Is Challenged by Widening Wealth Gap
headline.print_headline: Widening Wealth Gap in Vietnam Is Challenging Leaders’ Message of Equality
